text: Shujeo Shyam (born 1946) is a Bangladeshi singer, composer, and music director. He won Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Music Director three times for the films Hason Raja (2002), Joyjatra (2004) and Obujh Bou (2010). He was awarded Ekushey Padak in 2018 by the Government of Bangladesh. ==Early life and career== Shyam was involved with Swadhin Bangla Betar Kendra since April 1971. ==Awards== *Shilpakala Padak (2015) *Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Music Director **2002 for Hason Raja **2004 for Joyjatra **2010 for Abujh Bou *Ekushey Padak (2018) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1946 births Category:Bangladeshi composers Category:Recipients of the National Film Awards (Bangladesh) Category:Recipients of the Ekushey Padak
